name: Knight with a gun
description:
Instructions: 

  • aim/move = mouse
  • shoot/pickup = left click
  • Shoot at everything!

Bullet Hell Jam:

This fits the theme because you are confined in your way of interacting with the world, you can only use your gun. Sadly I could finish everything I wanted in the jam, but I'm really happy with how it turned out, so I will be updating it outside of the jam.
